title: "Volunteering boosts cognitive performance of participants, finds review study"
excerpt: "Volunteering in your free time is a good thing. For example, it can strengthen the team spirit in a club, is beneficial to the environment and provides support to older people. However, something that has not yet been the subject of much research are the health benefits for people who do the volunteering."
